We have a variety of different sized yurts to accommodate all manner of groups and budgets from a gang of 8 to an intimate couple. You can stay in absolute luxury or in complete comfort. All our yurts have a carpeted interior, cushions, table and supplies for a comfortable and fun weekend.

The deluxe interior consists of a proper double bed with a mosquito net,carpet, table, chairs, wash hand basin and silk cushioned benches. The basic interior includes carpet, 2 mattresses, scatter cushions and a table.

10’ Yurt – €450 with basic interior package sleeps max 2

16’ Yurt – €780 with basic interior package sleeps max 6

20’ Yurt – €880 with basic interior package sleeps max 8
